00017 UINT8 gubDoorUIValue = 0;
00018 UINT8 gubWindowUIValue = 0;
00019 UINT8 gubWallUIValue = FIRSTWALL;
00020 UINT8 gubBrokenWallUIValue = 0;
00021 
00022 void CalcSmartWallDefault( UINT16 *pusObjIndex, UINT16 *pusUseIndex )
00023 {
00024       *pusUseIndex = 0;
00025       *pusObjIndex = gubWallUIValue;
00026 }
00027 
00028 void CalcSmartDoorDefault( UINT16 *pusObjIndex, UINT16 *pusUseIndex )
00029 {
00030       *pusUseIndex = 4 * ( gubDoorUIValue % 2 ); //open or closed -- odd or even
00031       *pusObjIndex = FIRSTDOOR + gubDoorUIValue / 2;  
00032 }
00033 
00034 void CalcSmartWindowDefault( UINT16 *pusObjIndex, UINT16 *pusUseIndex )
00035 {
00036       *pusUseIndex = 44 + gubWindowUIValue; //first exterior top right oriented window
00037       *pusObjIndex = FIRSTWALL;
00038 }
00039 
00040 void CalcSmartBrokenWallDefault( UINT16 *pusObjIndex, UINT16 *pusUseIndex )
00041 {
00042       switch( gubBrokenWallUIValue )
00043       {
00044             case 0:case 1: *pusUseIndex = 49 + gubBrokenWallUIValue;    break;
00045             case 3:                        *pusUseIndex = 62;                                                                             break;
00046             case 4:                        *pusUseIndex = 64;                                                                             break;
00047       }
00048       *pusObjIndex = FIRSTWALL;
00049 }
00050 
00051 UINT16 CalcSmartWindowIndex( UINT16 usWallOrientation )
00052 {
00053       return (UINT16)(33 + usWallOrientation*3 + gubWindowUIValue);
00054 }
00055 
00056 UINT16 CalcSmartDoorIndex( UINT16 usWallOrientation )
00057 {
00058       //convert the orientation values as the graphics are in reverse order
00059       //orientation values:   INSIDE_TOP_LEFT=1,  INSIDE_TOP_RIGHT=2,  OUTSIDE_TOP_LEFT=3, OUTSIDE_TOP_RIGHT=4
00060       //door graphics order:  INSIDE_TOP_LEFT=15, INSIDE_TOP_RIGHT=10, OUTSIDE_TOP_LEFT=5, OUTSIDE_TOP_RIGHT=0
00061       usWallOrientation = (4 - usWallOrientation) * 5;
00062       //4 * (gubDoorUIValue%2) evaluates to +4 if the door is open, 0 if closed
00063       return (UINT16)( 1 + usWallOrientation + 4 * (gubDoorUIValue % 2) );
00064 }
00065 
00066 UINT16 CalcSmartDoorType()
00067 {
00068       return (UINT16)( FIRSTDOOR + gubDoorUIValue / 2 );
00069 }
00070 
00071 UINT16 CalcSmartBrokenWallIndex( UINT16 usWallOrientation )
00072 {
00073       if( gubBrokenWallUIValue == 2 ) //the hole in the wall
00074             return 0xffff;
00075       if( gubBrokenWallUIValue < 2 ) //broken walls
00076       {
00077             //convert the orientation value as the graphics are in a different order.
00078             //orientation values:   INSIDE_TOP_LEFT=1, INSIDE_TOP_RIGHT=2, OUTSIDE_TOP_LEFT=3, OUTSIDE_TOP_RIGHT=4
00079             //                                                                                                                4                                                           6                                                           8                                                            10
00080             //door graphics order:  INSIDE_TOP_LEFT=4, INSIDE_TOP_RIGHT=6, OUTSIDE_TOP_LEFT=0, OUTSIDE_TOP_RIGHT=2
00081             usWallOrientation = usWallOrientation * 2 + 2;
00082             usWallOrientation -= usWallOrientation > 6 ? 8 : 0;
00083             return (UINT16)( usWallOrientation + 48 + gubBrokenWallUIValue );
00084       }
00085       
00086       //cracked and smudged walls
00087 
00088       //convert the orientation value as the graphics are in a different order.
00089       //orientation values:   INSIDE_TOP_LEFT=1, INSIDE_TOP_RIGHT=2, OUTSIDE_TOP_LEFT=3, OUTSIDE_TOP_RIGHT=4
00090       //door graphics order:  INSIDE_TOP_LEFT=1, INSIDE_TOP_RIGHT=2, OUTSIDE_TOP_LEFT=5, OUTSIDE_TOP_RIGHT=6
00091       usWallOrientation += usWallOrientation > 1 ? 2 : 0;
00092       usWallOrientation += gubBrokenWallUIValue == 4 ? 2 : 0; //smudged type which is 2 index values higher.
00093       return (UINT16)( usWallOrientation + 57 );
00094 }
00095 
00096 void IncSmartWallUIValue()
00097 {
00098       gubWallUIValue += gubWallUIValue < LASTWALL ? 1 : -3;
00099 }
00100 
00101 void DecSmartWallUIValue()
00102 {
00103       gubWallUIValue -= gubWallUIValue > FIRSTWALL ? 1 : -3;
00104 }
00105 
00106 void IncSmartDoorUIValue()
00107 {
00108       gubDoorUIValue += gubDoorUIValue < 7 ? 1 : -7;
00109 }
00110 
00111 void DecSmartDoorUIValue()
00112 {
00113       gubDoorUIValue -= gubDoorUIValue > 0 ? 1 : -7;
00114 }
00115 
00116 void IncSmartWindowUIValue()
00117 {
00118       gubWindowUIValue += gubWindowUIValue < 2 ? 1 : -2;
00119 }
00120 
00121 void DecSmartWindowUIValue()
00122 {
00123       gubWindowUIValue -= gubWindowUIValue > 0 ? 1 : -2;
00124 }
00125 
00126 void IncSmartBrokenWallUIValue()
00127 {
00128       gubBrokenWallUIValue += gubBrokenWallUIValue < 4 ? 1 : -4;
00129 }
00130 
00131 void DecSmartBrokenWallUIValue()
00132 {
00133       gubBrokenWallUIValue -= gubBrokenWallUIValue > 0 ? 1 : -4;
00134 }

00138   return FALSE;

00141 BOOLEAN CalcDoorInfoUsingSmartMethod( UINT32 iMapIndex, UINT16 *pusDoorType, UINT16 *pusIndex )
00142 {
00143       LEVELNODE *pWall = NULL;
00144       UINT16 usWallOrientation;
00145       pWall = GetVerticalWall( iMapIndex );
00146       if( pWall )
00147       {
00148             GetWallOrientation( pWall->usIndex, &usWallOrientation );
00149             *pusIndex = CalcSmartDoorIndex( usWallOrientation ) - 1;
00150             *pusDoorType = CalcSmartDoorType();
00151             return TRUE;
00152       }
00153       pWall = GetHorizontalWall( iMapIndex );
00154       if( pWall )
00155       {
00156             GetWallOrientation( pWall->usIndex, &usWallOrientation );
00157             *pusIndex = CalcSmartDoorIndex( usWallOrientation ) - 1;
00158             *pusDoorType = CalcSmartDoorType();
00159             return TRUE;
00160       }
00161       return FALSE;
00162 }
00163 
00164 BOOLEAN CalcWindowInfoUsingSmartMethod( UINT32 iMapIndex, UINT16 *pusWallType, UINT16 *pusIndex )
00165 {
00166       LEVELNODE *pWall = NULL;
00167       UINT32 uiTileType;
00168       UINT16 usWallOrientation;
00169 
00170       pWall = GetVerticalWall( iMapIndex );
00171       if( pWall )
00172       {
00173             GetTileType( pWall->usIndex, &uiTileType );
00174             *pusWallType = (UINT16)uiTileType;
00175             if( uiTileType >= FIRSTDOOR && uiTileType <= LASTDOOR )
00176             {
00177                   //We want to be able to replace doors with a window, however, the doors do not
00178                   //contain the wall type, so we have to search for the nearest wall to extract it.
00179                   *pusWallType = SearchForWallType( iMapIndex );
00180             }
00181             GetWallOrientation( pWall->usIndex, &usWallOrientation );
00182             *pusIndex = CalcSmartWindowIndex( usWallOrientation ) - 1;
00183             return TRUE;
00184       }
00185       pWall = GetHorizontalWall( iMapIndex );
00186       if( pWall )
00187       {
00188             GetTileType( pWall->usIndex, &uiTileType );
00189             *pusWallType = (UINT16)uiTileType;
00190             if( uiTileType >= FIRSTDOOR && uiTileType <= LASTDOOR )
00191             {
00192                   //We want to be able to replace doors with a window, however, the doors do not
00193                   //contain the wall type, so we have to search for the nearest wall to extract it.
00194                   *pusWallType = SearchForWallType( iMapIndex );
00195             }
00196             GetWallOrientation( pWall->usIndex, &usWallOrientation );
00197             *pusIndex = CalcSmartWindowIndex( usWallOrientation ) - 1;
00198             return TRUE;
00199       }
00200       return FALSE;
00201 }

00203 BOOLEAN CalcBrokenWallInfoUsingSmartMethod( UINT32 iMapIndex, UINT16 *pusWallType, UINT16 *pusIndex )
00204 {
00205       LEVELNODE *pWall = NULL;
00206       UINT32 uiTileType;
00207       UINT16 usWallOrientation;
00208       
00209       if( gubBrokenWallUIValue == 2 ) //the hole in the wall
00210       {
00211             *pusWallType = 0xffff;
00212             *pusIndex = 0xffff;     //but it won't draw it.
00213             return TRUE;
00214       }
00215 
00216       pWall = GetVerticalWall( iMapIndex );
00217       if( pWall )
00218       {
00219             GetTileType( pWall->usIndex, &uiTileType );
00220             *pusWallType = (UINT16)uiTileType;
00221             if( uiTileType >= FIRSTDOOR && uiTileType <= LASTDOOR )
00222             {
00223                   //We want to be able to replace doors with a walltype, however, the doors do not
00224                   //contain the wall type, so we have to search for the nearest wall to extract it.
00225                   *pusWallType = SearchForWallType( iMapIndex );
00226             }
00227             GetWallOrientation( pWall->usIndex, &usWallOrientation );
00228             *pusIndex = CalcSmartBrokenWallIndex( usWallOrientation ) - 1;
00229             return TRUE;
00230       }
00231       pWall = GetHorizontalWall( iMapIndex );
00232       if( pWall )
00233       {
00234             GetTileType( pWall->usIndex, &uiTileType );
00235             *pusWallType = (UINT16)uiTileType;
00236             if( uiTileType >= FIRSTDOOR && uiTileType <= LASTDOOR )
00237             {
00238                   //We want to be able to replace doors with a walltype, however, the doors do not
00239                   //contain the wall type, so we have to search for the nearest wall to extract it.
00240                   *pusWallType = SearchForWallType( iMapIndex );
00241             }
00242             GetWallOrientation( pWall->usIndex, &usWallOrientation );
00243             *pusIndex = CalcSmartBrokenWallIndex( usWallOrientation ) - 1;
00244             return TRUE;
00245       }
00246       return FALSE;
00247 }

00249 
00250 //This is a very difficult function to document properly.  The reason being is that it is sooo 
00251 //subliminal by nature.  I have thought up of priorities and choose the best piece to draw based
00252 //on the surrounding conditions.  Here are the priorities which are referenced below via comments:
00253 //A)  If there is currently a bottom piece and a right piece, immediately exit.
00254 //B)  We are currently over a bottom piece.  Now, we don't automatically want to draw a right piece here
00255 //          for multiple reasons.  First, the UI will be too quick and place bottom and right pieces for every
00256 //          place the user clicks, which isn't what we want.  Therefore, we look to see if there is a right
00257 //    piece in the y-1 gridno.  It would then make sense to place a right piece down here.  Regardless,
00258 //          if we encounter a bottom piece here, we will exit.
00259 //C)  This is the counterpart to B, but we are looking at a current right piece, and are determining if
00260 //          we should place a bottom piece based on another bottom piece existing in the x-1 gridno.
00261 //D)  Now, we analyse the neighboring tiles and determine the orientations that would add weight to the 
00262 //    current tile either towards drawing a horizontal piece or a vertical piece.
00263 //E)  Now that we have the information, we give the highest priority to any weights that match the current
00264 //          wall piece type selected by the user.  Based on that, we will only consider the best match of the
00265 //          type and use it.  If there are no matches on type, we continue.
00266 //F)  We failed to find weights matching the current wall type, but before we give up using the user's wall 
00267 //          type, there are two more cases.  When there is a bottom wall in the y+1 position or a right wall in 
00268 //          the x+1 position.  If there are matching walls, there, then we draw two pieces to connect the current
00269 //          gridno with the respective position.
00270 void PasteSmartWall( UINT32 iMapIndex )
00271 {
00272       static BOOLEAN fWallAlone = FALSE;
00273       static UINT32 iAloneMapIndex = 0x8000;
00274       UINT16 usWallType;
00275 
00276       //These are the counters for the walls of each type 
00277       UINT16 usNumV[4]={0,0,0,0}; //vertical wall weights
00278       UINT16 usNumH[4]={0,0,0,0}; //horizontal wall weights
00279 
00280       //*A* See above documentation
00281       if( GetVerticalWall( iMapIndex ) && GetHorizontalWall( iMapIndex ) )
00282             return;
00283       //*B* See above documentation
00284       usWallType = GetHorizontalWallType( iMapIndex );
00285       if( usWallType )  
00286       { 
00287             if( usWallType == gubWallUIValue )
00288             {
00289                   usWallType = GetVerticalWallType( iMapIndex - WORLD_COLS );
00290                   if( usWallType == gubWallUIValue )
00291                   {
00292                         if( FloorAtGridNo( iMapIndex + 1 ) )
00293                               BuildWallPiece( iMapIndex, EXTERIOR_RIGHT, gubWallUIValue );
00294                         else
00295                               BuildWallPiece( iMapIndex, INTERIOR_RIGHT, gubWallUIValue );
00296                         return;
00297                   }
00298                   usWallType = GetHorizontalWallType( iMapIndex - WORLD_COLS );
00299                   if( usWallType == gubWallUIValue )
00300                   {
00301                         if( FloorAtGridNo( iMapIndex + 1 ) )
00302                         {
00303                               BuildWallPiece( iMapIndex, EXTERIOR_RIGHT, gubWallUIValue );
00304                               if( !GetHorizontalWall( iMapIndex - WORLD_COLS + 1 ) )
00305                                     ChangeVerticalWall( iMapIndex, INTERIOR_EXTENDED );
00306                         }
00307                         else
00308                         {
00309                               BuildWallPiece( iMapIndex, INTERIOR_RIGHT, gubWallUIValue );
00310                               if( !GetHorizontalWall( iMapIndex - WORLD_COLS + 1 ) )
00311                                     ChangeVerticalWall( iMapIndex, EXTERIOR_EXTENDED );
00312                         }
00313                   }
00314             }
00315             return;  
00316       }
00317       //*C* See above documentation
00318       usWallType = GetVerticalWallType( iMapIndex );
00319       if( usWallType )  
00320       { 
00321             if( usWallType == gubWallUIValue )
00322             {
00323                   usWallType = GetHorizontalWallType( iMapIndex - 1 );
00324                   if( usWallType == gubWallUIValue )
00325                   {
00326                         if( FloorAtGridNo( iMapIndex + WORLD_COLS ) )
00327                               BuildWallPiece( iMapIndex, EXTERIOR_BOTTOM, gubWallUIValue );
00328                         else
00329                               BuildWallPiece( iMapIndex, INTERIOR_BOTTOM, gubWallUIValue );
00330                   }
00331             }
00332             return;  
00333       }
00334       //*D* See above documentation
00335       //Evaluate left adjacent tile 
00336       if( usWallType = GetVerticalWallType( iMapIndex - 1 ) )
00337             usNumH[ usWallType - FIRSTWALL ]++; 
00338       if( usWallType = GetHorizontalWallType( iMapIndex - 1 ) )
00339             usNumH[ usWallType - FIRSTWALL ]++;
00340       //Evaluate right adjacent tile 
00341       if( usWallType = GetHorizontalWallType( iMapIndex + 1 ) )
00342             usNumH[ usWallType - FIRSTWALL ]++; 
00343       //Evaluate upper adjacent tile 
00344       if( usWallType = GetVerticalWallType( iMapIndex - WORLD_COLS ) )
00345             usNumV[ usWallType - FIRSTWALL ]++; 
00346       if( usWallType = GetHorizontalWallType( iMapIndex - WORLD_COLS ) )
00347             usNumV[ usWallType - FIRSTWALL ]++;
00348       //Evaluate lower adjacent tile 
00349       if( usWallType = GetVerticalWallType( iMapIndex + WORLD_COLS ) )
00350             usNumV[ usWallType - FIRSTWALL ]++; 
00351       //*E* See above documentation
00352       if( usNumV[gubWallUIValue - FIRSTWALL] | usNumH[gubWallUIValue - FIRSTWALL] )
00353       {
00354             if( usNumV[gubWallUIValue - FIRSTWALL] >= usNumH[gubWallUIValue - FIRSTWALL] )
00355             {
00356                   if( FloorAtGridNo( iMapIndex + 1 ) )
00357                   { //inside
00358                         BuildWallPiece( iMapIndex, EXTERIOR_RIGHT, gubWallUIValue );
00359                         //Change to extended piece if it is a new top right corner to cover the end part.
00360                         if( GetHorizontalWall( iMapIndex - WORLD_COLS ) && !GetHorizontalWall( iMapIndex - WORLD_COLS + 1 ) 
00361                                     && !GetVerticalWall( iMapIndex - WORLD_COLS ) )
00362                               ChangeVerticalWall( iMapIndex, INTERIOR_EXTENDED );
00363                         else if( GetHorizontalWall( iMapIndex - WORLD_COLS ) && !GetHorizontalWall( iMapIndex - WORLD_COLS - 1 ) 
00364                                                  && !GetVerticalWall( iMapIndex - WORLD_COLS - 1 ) )
00365                         {
00366                               ChangeVerticalWall( iMapIndex, INTERIOR_EXTENDED );
00367                               EraseHorizontalWall( iMapIndex - WORLD_COLS );
00368                         }
00369                   }
00370                   else
00371                   {     //outside
00372                         BuildWallPiece( iMapIndex, INTERIOR_RIGHT, gubWallUIValue );
00373                         if( GetHorizontalWall( iMapIndex - WORLD_COLS ) && !GetHorizontalWall( iMapIndex - WORLD_COLS + 1 ) 
00374                                     && !GetVerticalWall( iMapIndex - WORLD_COLS ) )
00375                               ChangeVerticalWall( iMapIndex, EXTERIOR_EXTENDED );
00376                         else if( GetHorizontalWall( iMapIndex - WORLD_COLS ) && !GetHorizontalWall( iMapIndex - WORLD_COLS - 1 ) 
00377                                                  && !GetVerticalWall( iMapIndex - WORLD_COLS - 1 ) )
00378                         {
00379                               ChangeVerticalWall( iMapIndex, EXTERIOR_EXTENDED );
00380                               EraseHorizontalWall( iMapIndex - WORLD_COLS );
00381                         }
00382                   }
00383             }
00384             else
00385             {
00386                   if( GetVerticalWall( iMapIndex - 1 ) && !GetVerticalWall( iMapIndex - WORLD_COLS - 1 ) 
00387                           && !GetHorizontalWall( iMapIndex - WORLD_COLS - 1 ) )
00388                         EraseVerticalWall( iMapIndex - 1);
00389                   if( FloorAtGridNo( iMapIndex + WORLD_COLS ) )
00390                   { //inside
00391                         BuildWallPiece( iMapIndex, EXTERIOR_BOTTOM, gubWallUIValue );
00392                         if( GetVerticalWall( iMapIndex + WORLD_COLS ) ) 
00393                               ChangeVerticalWall( iMapIndex + WORLD_COLS, INTERIOR_EXTENDED );
00394                         if( GetVerticalWall( iMapIndex + WORLD_COLS - 1 ) && !GetVerticalWall( iMapIndex - 1 ) )
00395                               ChangeVerticalWall( iMapIndex + WORLD_COLS - 1,  INTERIOR_EXTENDED );
00396                         else if( GetVerticalWall( iMapIndex - 1 ) && !GetVerticalWall( iMapIndex + WORLD_COLS - 1 ) 
00397                                                  && FloorAtGridNo( iMapIndex ) )
00398                               ChangeVerticalWall( iMapIndex - 1, INTERIOR_BOTTOMEND );
00399                   }
00400                   else
00401                   { //outside
00402                         BuildWallPiece( iMapIndex, INTERIOR_BOTTOM, gubWallUIValue );
00403                         if( GetVerticalWall( iMapIndex + WORLD_COLS ) ) 
00404                               ChangeVerticalWall( iMapIndex + WORLD_COLS, EXTERIOR_EXTENDED );
00405                         if( GetVerticalWall( iMapIndex + WORLD_COLS - 1 ) && !GetVerticalWall( iMapIndex - 1 ) )
00406                               ChangeVerticalWall( iMapIndex + WORLD_COLS - 1,  EXTERIOR_EXTENDED );
00407                         else if( GetVerticalWall( iMapIndex - 1 ) && !GetVerticalWall( iMapIndex + WORLD_COLS - 1 ) 
00408                                                  && FloorAtGridNo( iMapIndex ) )
00409                               ChangeVerticalWall( iMapIndex - 1, EXTERIOR_BOTTOMEND );
00410                   }
00411             }
00412             return;
00413       }
00414       //*F* See above documentation
00415       usWallType = GetHorizontalWallType( iMapIndex + WORLD_COLS );
00416       if( usWallType == gubWallUIValue )
00417       {
00418             if( !GetHorizontalWall( iMapIndex + WORLD_COLS - 1 ) )
00419                   EraseHorizontalWall( iMapIndex + WORLD_COLS );
00420             if( FloorAtGridNo( iMapIndex + 1 ) )
00421             { //inside
00422                   BuildWallPiece( iMapIndex + WORLD_COLS, EXTERIOR_RIGHT, gubWallUIValue );
00423                   BuildWallPiece( iMapIndex, EXTERIOR_RIGHT, gubWallUIValue );
00424                   if( !GetVerticalWall( iMapIndex + WORLD_COLS * 2 ) && FloorAtGridNo( iMapIndex + WORLD_COLS * 2 + 1 ) )
00425                         ChangeVerticalWall( iMapIndex + WORLD_COLS, INTERIOR_BOTTOMEND );
00426                   else //override the damn other smoothing.
00427                         ChangeVerticalWall( iMapIndex + WORLD_COLS, INTERIOR_R );
00428             }
00429             else
00430             { //outside
00431                   BuildWallPiece( iMapIndex + WORLD_COLS, INTERIOR_RIGHT, gubWallUIValue );
00432                   BuildWallPiece( iMapIndex, INTERIOR_RIGHT, gubWallUIValue );
00433                   if( !GetVerticalWall( iMapIndex + WORLD_COLS * 2 ) && !FloorAtGridNo( iMapIndex + WORLD_COLS * 2 + 1 ) )
00434                         ChangeVerticalWall( iMapIndex + WORLD_COLS, EXTERIOR_BOTTOMEND );
00435                   else //override the damn other smoothing.
00436                         ChangeVerticalWall( iMapIndex + WORLD_COLS, EXTERIOR_R );
00437             }
00438             return;
00439       }
00440       usWallType = GetVerticalWallType( iMapIndex + 1 );
00441       if( usWallType == gubWallUIValue )
00442       {
00443             if(FloorAtGridNo( iMapIndex + WORLD_COLS ) )
00444             { //inside 
00445                   BuildWallPiece( iMapIndex + 1, EXTERIOR_BOTTOM, gubWallUIValue );
00446                   BuildWallPiece( iMapIndex, EXTERIOR_BOTTOM, gubWallUIValue );
00447                   if( !GetVerticalWall( iMapIndex - WORLD_COLS + 1 ) )
00448                   {
00449                         EraseVerticalWall( iMapIndex + 1 );
00450                         ChangeVerticalWall( iMapIndex + WORLD_COLS + 1, INTERIOR_EXTENDED );
00451                   }
00452                   if( !GetVerticalWall( iMapIndex + WORLD_COLS + 1) )
00453                   {
00454                         if( !GetHorizontalWall( iMapIndex - WORLD_COLS + 1) && !GetVerticalWall( iMapIndex - WORLD_COLS + 1 )
00455                                     && GetHorizontalWall( iMapIndex - WORLD_COLS + 2 ) )
00456                               ChangeVerticalWall( iMapIndex + 1, INTERIOR_EXTENDED );
00457                         else
00458                               ChangeVerticalWall( iMapIndex + 1, INTERIOR_BOTTOMEND );
00459                   }
00460             }     
00461             else
00462             { //outside
00463                   BuildWallPiece( iMapIndex + 1, INTERIOR_BOTTOM, gubWallUIValue );
00464                   BuildWallPiece( iMapIndex, INTERIOR_BOTTOM, gubWallUIValue );
00465                   if( !GetVerticalWall( iMapIndex - WORLD_COLS + 1 ) )
00466                   {
00467                         EraseVerticalWall( iMapIndex + 1 );
00468                         ChangeVerticalWall( iMapIndex + WORLD_COLS + 1, EXTERIOR_EXTENDED );
00469                   }
00470                   if( !GetVerticalWall( iMapIndex + WORLD_COLS + 1) )
00471                   {
00472                         if( !GetHorizontalWall( iMapIndex - WORLD_COLS + 1) && !GetVerticalWall( iMapIndex - WORLD_COLS + 1 )
00473                                     && GetHorizontalWall( iMapIndex - WORLD_COLS + 2 ) )
00474                               ChangeVerticalWall( iMapIndex + 1, EXTERIOR_EXTENDED );
00475                         else
00476                               ChangeVerticalWall( iMapIndex + 1, EXTERIOR_BOTTOMEND );
00477                   }
00478             }
00479             return;
00480       }
00481       //Check for the highest weight value.
00482 }
00483 
00484 void PasteSmartDoor( UINT32 iMapIndex )
00485 {
00486       LEVELNODE *pWall = NULL;
00487       UINT16 usTileIndex;
00488       UINT16 usDoorType;
00489       UINT16 usIndex;
00490       UINT16 usWallOrientation;
00491 
00492       if( pWall = GetVerticalWall( iMapIndex ) )
00493       {
00494             GetWallOrientation( pWall->usIndex, &usWallOrientation );
00495             usIndex = CalcSmartDoorIndex( usWallOrientation );
00496             usDoorType = CalcSmartDoorType();
00497             AddToUndoList( iMapIndex );
00498             GetTileIndexFromTypeSubIndex( usDoorType, usIndex, &usTileIndex );
00499             ReplaceStructIndex( iMapIndex, pWall->usIndex, usTileIndex );
00500       }
00501       if( pWall = GetHorizontalWall( iMapIndex ) )
00502       {
00503             GetWallOrientation( pWall->usIndex, &usWallOrientation );
00504             usIndex = CalcSmartDoorIndex( usWallOrientation );
00505             usDoorType = CalcSmartDoorType();
00506             AddToUndoList( iMapIndex );
00507             GetTileIndexFromTypeSubIndex( usDoorType, usIndex, &usTileIndex );
00508             ReplaceStructIndex( iMapIndex, pWall->usIndex, usTileIndex );
00509       }
00510 }
00511 
00512 void PasteSmartWindow( UINT32 iMapIndex )
00513 {
00514       UINT16 usNewWallIndex;
00515 
00516       LEVELNODE *pWall = NULL;
00517       UINT32 uiTileType;
00518       UINT16 usWallType;
00519       UINT16 usIndex;
00520       UINT16 usWallOrientation;
00521 
00522       pWall = GetVerticalWall( iMapIndex );
00523       if( pWall )
00524       {
00525             GetTileType( pWall->usIndex, &uiTileType );
00526             usWallType = (UINT16)uiTileType;
00527             if( uiTileType >= FIRSTDOOR && uiTileType <= LASTDOOR )
00528             {
00529                   //We want to be able to replace doors with a window, however, the doors do not
00530                   //contain the wall type, so we have to search for the nearest wall to extract it.
00531                   usWallType = SearchForWallType( iMapIndex );
00532             }
00533             GetWallOrientation( pWall->usIndex, &usWallOrientation );
00534             usIndex = CalcSmartWindowIndex( usWallOrientation );
00535             //Calculate the new graphic for the window type selected.
00536             
00537             AddToUndoList( iMapIndex );
00538             GetTileIndexFromTypeSubIndex( usWallType, usIndex, &usNewWallIndex );
00539             ReplaceStructIndex( iMapIndex, pWall->usIndex, usNewWallIndex );
00540       }
00541       pWall = GetHorizontalWall( iMapIndex );
00542       if( pWall )
00543       {
00544             GetTileType( pWall->usIndex, &uiTileType );
00545             usWallType = (UINT16)uiTileType;
00546             if( uiTileType >= FIRSTDOOR && uiTileType <= LASTDOOR )
00547             {
00548                   //We want to be able to replace doors with a window, however, the doors do not
00549                   //contain the wall type, so we have to search for the nearest wall to extract it.
00550                   usWallType = SearchForWallType( iMapIndex );
00551             }
00552             GetWallOrientation( pWall->usIndex, &usWallOrientation );
00553             usIndex = CalcSmartWindowIndex( usWallOrientation );
00554             //Calculate the new graphic for the window type selected.
00555             AddToUndoList( iMapIndex );
00556             GetTileIndexFromTypeSubIndex( usWallType, usIndex, &usNewWallIndex );
00557             ReplaceStructIndex( iMapIndex, pWall->usIndex, usNewWallIndex );
00558       }
00559 }
00560 
00561 void PasteSmartBrokenWall( UINT32 iMapIndex )
00562 {
00563       UINT16 usNewWallIndex;
00564 
00565       LEVELNODE *pWall;
00566       UINT32 uiTileType;
00567       UINT16 usWallType;
00568       UINT16 usIndex;
00569       UINT16 usWallOrientation;
00570 
00571       pWall = GetVerticalWall( iMapIndex );
00572       if( pWall )
00573       {
00574             GetTileType( pWall->usIndex, &uiTileType );
00575             usWallType = (UINT16)uiTileType;
00576             if( uiTileType >= FIRSTDOOR && uiTileType <= LASTDOOR )
00577             {
00578                   usWallType = SearchForWallType( iMapIndex );
00579             }
00580             GetWallOrientation( pWall->usIndex, &usWallOrientation );
00581             usIndex = CalcSmartBrokenWallIndex( usWallOrientation );
00582             if( usIndex == 0xffff )
00583             {
00584                   AddToUndoList( iMapIndex );
00585                   RemoveStruct( iMapIndex, pWall->usIndex );
00586             }
00587             else
00588             {
00589                   AddToUndoList( iMapIndex );
00590                   GetTileIndexFromTypeSubIndex( usWallType, usIndex, &usNewWallIndex );
00591                   ReplaceStructIndex( iMapIndex, pWall->usIndex, usNewWallIndex );
00592             }
00593       }
00594       pWall = GetHorizontalWall( iMapIndex );
00595       if( pWall )
00596       {
00597             GetTileType( pWall->usIndex, &uiTileType );
00598             usWallType = (UINT16)uiTileType;
00599             if( uiTileType >= FIRSTDOOR && uiTileType <= LASTDOOR )
00600             {
00601                   //We want to be able to replace doors with a window, however, the doors do not
00602                   //contain the wall type, so we have to search for the nearest wall to extract it.
00603                   usWallType = SearchForWallType( iMapIndex );
00604             }
00605             GetWallOrientation( pWall->usIndex, &usWallOrientation );
00606             usIndex = CalcSmartBrokenWallIndex( usWallOrientation );
00607             if( usIndex == 0xffff )
00608             {
00609                   AddToUndoList( iMapIndex );
00610                   RemoveStruct( iMapIndex, pWall->usIndex );
00611             }
00612             else
00613             {
00614                   AddToUndoList( iMapIndex );
00615                   GetTileIndexFromTypeSubIndex( usWallType, usIndex, &usNewWallIndex );
00616                   ReplaceStructIndex( iMapIndex, pWall->usIndex, usNewWallIndex );
00617             }
00618             //Calculate the new graphic for the window type selected.
00619       }
00620 }
